a.title: Legend for this format

description.value: EHDS refined base model for a clinical condition, problem, diagnosis, or other event, situation, issue, or clinical concept that has risen to a level of concern.

short.value: Condition model

definition.value: EHDS refined base model for a clinical condition, problem, diagnosis, or other event, situation, issue, or clinical concept that has risen to a level of concern.

short.value: Common header for all patient-related data

definition.value: Common header for all patient-related data

short.value: Patient/subject information

definition.value: Patient/subject information

short.value: Business identifier for the object

definition.value: Business identifier for the object

short.value: Resource authoring details

definition.value: Resource authoring details

short.value: Author(s) by whom the resource was/were authored. Multiple authors could be provided.

definition.value: Author(s) by whom the resource was/were authored. Multiple authors could be provided.

short.value: Date and time of authoring/issuing

definition.value: Date and time of authoring/issuing

short.value: Date and time of the last update to the resource (may be used for technical corrections).

definition.value: Date and time of the last update to the resource (may be used for technical corrections).

short.value: Status of the resource or document

definition.value: Status of the resource or document

short.value: Reason for the current status of the resource.

definition.value: Reason for the current status of the resource.

short.value: Language in which the resource is written. Language is expressed by the IETF language tag.

definition.value: Language in which the resource is written. Language is expressed by the IETF language tag.

definition.value: Code identifying the condition, problem or diagnosis

definition.value: The date or estimated date that the condition resolved or went into remission

short.value: Assertion about the certainty associated with a diagnosis. Diagnostic and/or clinical evidence of condition.

definition.value: Assertion about the certainty associated with a diagnosis. Diagnostic and/or clinical evidence of condition.

short.value: The asserter of the condition

definition.value: The asserter of the condition

short.value: Date and time of the diagnosis assertion

definition.value: Date and time of the diagnosis assertion

short.value: Health Professional who may be specifically related to the problem, as a preferred contact.

definition.value: Health Professional who may be specifically related to the problem, as a preferred contact.

short.value: External Resource which may be specifically related to the problem, for example a link between a rare disease problem and the corresponding guidelines.

definition.value: External Resource which may be specifically related to the problem, for example a link between a rare disease problem and the corresponding guidelines.
